title: Enhancing AI Practical Skills: Culture-Based Learning City Design Workshop: Participatory Mapping and Spatial Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic urban planning, cultural heritage preservation concepts, and fundamental digital map utilization skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: At least three symbolic spaces and community narratives in the region can be identified using participatory cultural mapping tools
At least two learning city design nodes, including cultural heritage, can be proposed by applying spatial analysis techniques
A design proposal with a learning space suitability score (DSS) of 0.8 or higher can be developed by combining AI-generated design concepts with community feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
